name: Madman in a prison
description:
I am a 13 year old that loves to  program. This is my first game Jam game and is made with handmade assets(that's why they are bad) and no reused code. However, other than the main theme the music is taken from royalty-free sites. 

The Game: You are a crazy madman who has been abandoned on an "planet." You are imprisoned and must feed the urge to kill to stay "sane". (The reason the mad man level and the hp are off is because of some weird thing when exporting)

#finishedit
